website_summaries.verdict: Choose this inexpensive multi-pack of teeth grinding guards if you want the kind you can fit yourself and don't need to wear them nightly. The others on our list are more durable and practical for serious grinders.
pros: A value-priced four-pack with two sizes that can you can customize to fit
Can fit top or bottom teeth
Ideal for wearers who prefer soft, flexible material
Can also be worn for playing sports or whitening teeth
cons: Achieving the proper fit may require repeated heating, which could degrade the material
Trimming to fit can also be challenging

customer_reviews.title: It works! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of money on mouth guards that never worked and I am so happy I have finally found one that works!! If you follow the instructions it will mold just right! Make sure the water is boiling hot though. The bottom one is harder to do than the top, but I always just wear the top so it works out brilliantly! Also, I had to cut mine to size before I put it into the boiling water.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a horrible nighttime grinder and I needed something to keep me from doing it. The last few days I could barely eat from grinding so much. I can't wait to try this out! I Messed my first guard up and it shrunk to a very small size. Just Make sure the water isn't to hot but other than that my second guard I was able to fit properly and it fits perfectly in my mouth. I can speak with it in and it doesn't fall out! Definitely love this and it beats paying $300 for one from my dentist! Can't wait to use it tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Clark0218

customer_reviews.title: Perfect softness & thickness, all night comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed for the price to get 4 total molds. Carry case is a nice accessory. Slight negative is two molds per blister pack, so i made myself 2 immediately. Hopefully the Small molds can be used as vacation type throwaway/backups, or for lower row of teeth. Detailed easy to folliw instructions. Only question mark now is longevity/ durability, since its only a week old and gets daily use. Not quite as far-reaching back to the molars as my worn out dentist made one, but the quality, thickness and size are perfect for making many spares.
customer_reviews.author: fedgovguy

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my dentist said I was grinding my teeth and the wear on them was substantial. After looking at several similar products I decided to go with Dental Duty. I am glad that I did! This product is excellent. It comes with a DVD that demonstrates how to mold the guards to your teeth. There are two sizes of guards included (4 pcs. all together) and a storage box for your guard. The molding process was super easy and the fit is amazing. This product costs $20 versus the $500 my dentist was going to charge. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Has help me so much just know that you will need mess up the first one But it's a great product....This is an amazing company great customer service..I reach out to them about messing up my first mouthguard and they sent me a free order... My constant headaches are gone..
customer_reviews.author: Don18

customer_reviews.title: Dental Duty does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The 'Dental Duty' kit worked great! Now I don't grind my teeth at night.
customer_reviews.author: Banjoman

customer_reviews.title: The last long time
customer_reviews.text: I have to use teeth guards all the time. I finally got these instead of the ones at Walmart and these other places. They've lasted a long time. I usually drive right through them. They're very comfortable. And you get a few so you can put one in your traveling bag one medicine cabinet and one even in your room. So when you take those quick nap you don't have to wake up with a jaw and aching headache from grinding your teeth. These things are Lifesavers. I'll recommend them to you and a friend I'd even recommend them to family cuz I feel so comfortable but days.
customer_reviews.author: lifeiswonderful

customer_reviews.title: It shrinks a lot!
customer_reviews.text: It is simple to follow the directions for molding the mouth piece. When it says it shrinks when heated it does. I chose to use the small one first as it was large enough to cover all my teeth. After molding the back teeth were not covered. But it still serves it's designed purpose. Next time I'll use the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick L Weaver 1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions to a tee and they will come out great. The step where you have to suck all the air and water out of your mouth is especially important to molding it to your teeth and the roof of your mouth tightly. It feels like a very secure fit, hopefully I won't spit it out overnight like Dental guards I've had prior. I will update in the future. I will definitely buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I give a bad review because I didn't know you had to heat and mould it but after complain I did it just right perfect
customer_reviews.author: Karlene Williams

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to mold. However, the material is thick I had a hard time closing my mouth. They ended up causing jaw pain and I had to take them out to actually sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did it myself instead of spending hundreds of dollars
customer_reviews.text: Dentist was suggesting she would have to fit me for a bite guard because I reportedly grind my teeth at night. While I have excellent dental insurance, none of it would be covered so I looked for alternatives on my own that wouldn't cost me hundreds of dollars. Well I came across THIS and I couldn't be happier! It was extremely easy to make my own, custom-molded bite guard. And for just $20! In fact, I made TWO; one for primary use and a second as a back-up guard. Very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Inked_girl

customer_reviews.title: I assumed that I wouldn't like it before I got it
customer_reviews.text: I assumed that I wouldn't like it before I got it. Yes, I didn't like it. No, I wouldn't buy it again. I didn't even get to use it one night. Its just bad quality, if you actually need a dental guard, you'll have to let your local dentist office rob you for a real professional dental guard.
customer_reviews.author: Earthwarder

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC PLASTIC and BAD FIT
customer_reviews.text: This product was a giant waste of money. Out of the 4 trays nothing fit any part of my actual mouth. On top of that, no matter how many times I washed them, this leechy plastic taste and feeling never went away, and Im supposed to suck on and swallow it the whole time they are forming to my mouth. After an hour of trying I felt like I was gonna puke. I wouldnt drink a bottle of water that had been sitting in the sun, why is it a good idea to swallow melted plastic? BAD BAD BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Haza11

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, inexpensive guard for grinders
customer_reviews.text: For some time now my dentist has recommended a bite guard due to the wear on my teeth from grinding in my sleep. Problem was my insurance didn't cover it and the price from the dentist office was several hundred dollars. I spotted this produc and thought "why not?" Molding them to my teeth was easy. The results have been incredible. I am sleeping better and never wake up sure. My wife tells me that I am not nearly as restless in bed as I was before trying the guard out. Haven't had any issues with durability. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: appgap

customer_reviews.title: This is waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is waste of money. Doesn't fit very well, and doesn't mold very well to fit my jaw size. On asking for refund, I am asked to leave a positive reply to get another pair of this junk. Poor customer service and unprofessional attitude. "RISK FREE: Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance. If our product doesn't satisfy your needs, we most certainly will honor a 30-day money-back guarantee. No questions asked!" - Yes this is another joke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I made one and really liked it. Then I lost it. I bought another case and made two more. I really like these. My problem was that I was clenching my jaw and grinding my teeth. I still wake up now sometimes feeling tension or some small pain in my jaw from clenching, but the pain is much better in both my jaw and my teeth. I was really nervous about the application, but luckily my spouse has made one before, so it was really easy for us. I also like that it holds its place so well that I can talk while I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: MBM

customer_reviews.title: Different system from other brands gives more comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I have used Dentek and Target brand dental guards in the past and find Dental Duty gives a more comfortable fit. It is a little harder to set up, so make sure you read and follow the instructions carefully: Dentek/Target are a solid piece of plastic that you soften and sink your teeth into (very easy); Dental Duty is more of a tray that you fit around your teeth, soften, and then mold with your fingers around your teeth (instructions required). But whereas the Dentek/Target ones always came out fitting so tightly that my bite felt weird in the morning when I woke up, Dental Duty just protects my teeth without putting any torque on the teeth.
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: safe your money - seller is offering cash reward to withdraw my review
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money - disappointing result. Followed instructions and after various attempts, still unable to produce a dental guard that stays in place. Material too soft, lumpy fit. Does not cling to your bite and comes lose as soon as you move your jaws.
customer_reviews.author: jpd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect while I wait for replacement of hard guard
customer_reviews.text: Getting a proper fit is a bit tricky- but since there is a pack of 4, I will try again to get it right on my back two molars. I am waking up with a strange bite. Still, the first guard I made is not painful, protects my teeth, does not fall out (I used the trick of dipping in hot water, squeezing the edges, and then dipping in cold water to make the fit more snug). Before I got my professional guard from the dentist (about 10 years ago) I used drug store guards and always chewed through them quickly. This holds up much better than the at home molded guards I remember!
customer_reviews.author: KHShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good fit.
customer_reviews.text: The night guard was easy to fit to my mouth and gives a very tight but comfortable fit. At around $20 it is a good bargain when compared to the guards that the dentist will build for you and frankly I find these to be a bit more comfortable than the ones from the dentist. Since I just got these I cannot comment on how durable they are. I don't know if these would be appropriate for sports use or not but are great as a night guard.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crable

customer_reviews.title: works great, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Watch the video so you know how to do the molding. I did, and mine works great and is comfortable enough that I forget I'm wearing it. My roommate did not even read the directions, and thought that she was supposed to wear one of the guards on her bottom teeth and one on the top. She heated them both and put them both in her mouth at the same time...with the result that they essentially got glued to each other and she couldn't open her mouth. Don't be like my roommate. Read the instructions!
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It formed to my teeth fine but simply falls out if I open my mouth
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Only 3 stars because it is not possible for me to get it to be a tight fit. I followed the instructions step by step and was not able to get the mouth guard any tighter. It formed to my teeth fine but simply falls out if I open my mouth. I attempted to make it a tighter fit per the instructions but it just simply does not work. Maybe I have small teeth? Either way it was worth the $20 to see if it worked before I got a professional one made. It may work for you but it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: What a product! What a company!
customer_reviews.text: The product is just amazing. DentalDuty is a fantastic mouth guard. The box comes with everything you need including a CD with directions. The company ‘s customer service is SO responsive that even if you made a mistake customizing it they will eplace it. What surprises me the most is the quality of the actual product. It is a clean transparent guard that always clean. The included box for carrying it is also fantastic. I recommend this product with the highest possible mark.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Awesome this bite guard is better then the bite guard ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome this bite guard is better then the bite guard I had years ago from the dentist that had cost $300. I’m a constant teeth grinder and this bite guard actually feels better than the expensive ones. Comes with very detailed instructions fits perfectly and comfortably, great customer service. So glad I found this product I will definitely be recommending it to others
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good intentions, great company, ineffective product...
customer_reviews.text: Account holder's progeny, here. I have severe capsulitis. This thing sucks. The larger size is too thick to mold over all the teeth, and the smaller size is too small for an adult. It's making my jaw hurt more, & throwing my bite off even more. My dentist adjusted the thing, and a few weeks later, it started dislodging while I was sleeping, & the dentist said it was loosening. I gave it an extra star b/c Dental Duty kindly sent me a longer, slightly thinner mold as a response to my bad review, and it wouldn't stretch far enough to cover my back teeth. I tried about 6x & it was impossible to fit. Good intentions, ineffective product(s).
customer_reviews.author: Irving Drew

customer_reviews.title: Large, bulky, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product was way too large. I don't consider myself having a particularly small mouth, but even after trimming length off the smallest guard and reforming it, it was much too large and bulky and uncomfortable. Felt like a sports guard. I couldn't sleep in it. Also - why do they include a DVD of instructions? It's pretty wasteful and expensive in my opinion. Most of us ordered on the internet, a link to an instructional video would have been a lot more helpful, at least to me.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya

customer_reviews.title: Save hundreds on this simple, DIY night guard
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. The written directions don't match the YouTube tutorial so I left the guard in the hot water a little too long on my first attempt. That guard was wrecked but on the second attempt, I went by the written directions and got it right. It's a good thing that the company provides two guards of each size because it's fairly easy to screw up one up in the learning process. That said, the finished guard is pretty comfortable and seems durable. My dentist was going to bill $215 for their custom-fitted night guard. This one was less than $20 bucks! It's a no brainer, just be careful and follow the directions exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Pros: cheap, lightweight feeling, they give you a few to work with Cons: fit too snug on my teeth felt like if I wore nightly would put too much pressure on my teeth, took two to get one right but still wasn't happy with it even after proper fitting and trimming it for comfort, for me a waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: quick, simple, satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: it was pretty simple to create my own mold and quick! the demo didn't really help..it was actually useless:/ I had to go on YouTube and watch other people's tutorials! The guy on the demo was covering so many important parts and you can't even rewind or pause the c.d!! Other than that the night guard is soooo easy to do and soo inexpensive compared to the hundreds of $$ I had to spend on previous guards
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Dial

customer_reviews.title: Nighttime grinders, save your teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a notorious grinder of my teeth. In fact , it have run in our entire family. I have paid thousands of dollars on my teeth with 10's of crowns. I have spent hundreds on dentist made night guards only to find the not usable after changes to my teeth, my dentist says we will make another. I can't afford all this dental work, so this device keeps my teeth from grinding against other at night. If there is a change to my mouth, just reheat them and start over. Inexpensive enough to just form another set. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID M.

customer_reviews.title: Dont Waste Your Money, product is difficult to mold, "Guarantee" is a lie,
customer_reviews.text: I could not get the product to mold correctly - it either shrunk too quickly or didn't mold to the mouth. In the package there is card stating to contact Dental Duty directly for refund as Amazon will not process refunds for dental products. I requested refund, attaching the Amazon PDF receipt that showed the product purchase. The Dental Duty support responded, "The order number that you have provided does not show any previous purchases." This is a lie as it was clear on the PDF receipt from Amazon. Dental Duty support then suggest I contact Amazon support. Lies and a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff

customer_reviews.title: I forget I’m wearing it.
customer_reviews.text: I have wicked tmj and have tried a few mouth guards. I bite through the 3 day guards in a night. I decided to try this guard and it’s wonderful. It comes with four guards two small and two large. I am using a small on my top teeth. It fits comfortably and perfectly. I honestly forget it’s in. My fitted guard looks a little funky. Don’t try and read the instructions after you’ve dropped it in the boiling water. So it got a little deformed on one side but didn’t effect the fit. Came on time and in appropriate sized packaging.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctah

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This is my second guard, and the first from this company. First, watch the video enclosed in the packaging it will help a lot. I got the guard molded easy after viewing the video and reading the instructions. The guard is very comfortable and does the job. No need to spend hundreds to the dentist for them to mold one for you. It's also nice that there are two molds in two different sizes, and also if you screw up the molding process contact the company and they will send another free of charge. Really can't go wrong with this .
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Custom Fit, Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Between the dentist and orthodontist, the charge for a custom fit dental guard to treat TMJ was between $500-$1000. After reading the reviews, I decided on the Professional Dental Guards instead. I had some difficulty forming one of the small mouth guards. I emailed the folks at Dental Duty and they responded within hours offering a few additional tips. They were awesome, probably the best customer service of any company I have ever dealt with. Once I got the correct fit, the dental guard has been great and also comfortable during sleep. I would highly recommend trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using the Good Morning Snore Solution (GMSS) to try help tame my inner sleeping bear. While I think the GMSS is a product that works for me, I have a hard time keeping it in all night because my teeth painfully dig into the top and bottom of my tongue. Enter the Professional Dental Guard. This product works, fits, and feels better than expected! It's thin, custom, and comfortable. For the price, you can't beat it! Give this product a shot and I'm sure you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Mold, Comfortable, Works!
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase mouth guards from a sporting goods store. Then I spent a lot of money and the dentist made one. But it is not fitting well even though I have filed on it. I'm afraid I will pull caps off or even break teeth. So I ordered these dental guards. Although I have molded guards previously, I watched the video that came in the box. It was quite helpful. And there are four guards in the box which is a bargain. The guard molded great. I have worn it two nights and like it. I didn't trim on it as I used to the adult sport mouth guards. It's great. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good all around
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to use. Came with good instructions. Basically just boiled water, let them soak in the water for about 12 seconds, took it out to cool off for a few seconds, and then fitted them to my teeth. The box came with four of them, a quantity of two in two different sizes.. The larger ones fit my teeth well. This allowed me to make two trays, one for home and one for travel. I still have two of the smaller ones which I will probably allow my children to use for sports. All in all a good purchase at a good price for what appears to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my dentist said I grind my teeth at night. I could see how these might be able to help some people but the molding process didnt work that well and this was super uncomfortable to sleep with so I usually ended up taking them out and after a few nights I just stopped wearing it. I actually just found out that if I cut out coffee from my diet, it helped significantly with the grinding. Give that a shot first before buying these.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: easy to make and works good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my dog ate my dentist made night guard. I was a little worried since the cost is pretty cheap, but I was very surprised that the instructions (youtube video) where straight forward and easy to mold to my mouth. The best part is if and when this one wears out there is another mold in the box to create a second one. The material is soft and my teeth feel way better in the morning, I clench my teeth at night and sometimes grind. Would buy again especially since my insurance wouldn't cover the dentist made one which cost around $500.00.
customer_reviews.author: APalmo

customer_reviews.title: Great once the fit is right!
customer_reviews.text: My dentist quoted me $900 💸 for a guard and my insurance doesn't cover it at all, so after reading many reviews I decided to try this. I definitely recommend it. It took me 2 tries to get the fit perfect, but once I did it was way more comfortable to sleep with. I highly suggest doing the last step to tighten the fit - it makes all the difference. And it comes with 4 different sizes, so the second time I just picked out the thinnest one and trimmed it to my size. 4 also means 4 tries to get it perfect! I've had a lot less pain and haven't been waking up with migraines anymore.. So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: FLD

customer_reviews.title: These are the only kind I use!
customer_reviews.text: I grind my teeth and clench my jaw at night and so I’ve been using mouth guards for a long time-I’ve been through expensive online brands that hurt my gums to crappy Walmart kinda and I’ve never found anything I like as much as these. They’re easy to mold, I love the container and easy to clean. Every morning I just rinse it with hot water and brush them with toothpaste so they’re clean and that’s it. I’ll use the same one until it starts looking nasty and switch out for the other one and so it lasts a while. No more jaw issues for me.
customer_reviews.author: JNizzle

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This is total junk doesnt mold or fit properly. You might as well just buy a football mouthguard from the sporting goods store.. All this is going to do is mess up your teeth alignment during the night with prolong usage. I went and got the real one fitted from the orthodontic guy and its a totally perfect fit not this sloppy loose junk, with your saliva drooling becasuse of the inacurate fit. But do as you wish, some people are happy eating at Chilis and TGI Fridays they think is cheap and same as a regular restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: F. R.

customer_reviews.title: Can make it worse
customer_reviews.text: We got this because my husband was grinding his teeth at night because of pain in his knee. We first of all could not get it in any way to fit his mouth and he could not even put it in without gagging. So we ended up going to the dentist to get a temporary one made. More money yes but he now has worn it at night just fine. The dentist said these kind of products can actually worsen the problem and make things bad. Also suggested that warm compresses on the jaw can ease the swelling and take away the dull headache that comes as a result of the grinding. I would stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: N. silverman

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I went thru all 4 of these trying to get a good fit. it feels bulky and uncomfortable compared to my custom made night guard ( it doesn't fit anymore ) Dentists do not recommend these because they are to thick and you will bite down on it more. I don't like how it goes on the roof of your mouth. I will be going to my dentist to get a new custom night guard
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product . The material is exceptional! And customer care is the best I have ever encountered. I mess up my first and second tries, is just wasn't perfect . I wrote them an email asking for help and in a matter of minutes got a responce saying they would send out a replacement, got it already, and explained carefully what I should do to get a perfect fit. This time it worked out right. I was using water that was too hot. Best out there, don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Morales

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I guess for the price it's OK, did not expect much. Wanted to replace my old grind guard that my dentist made for me a while ago - if you are looking for something like that - this is not for you. It is way bulkier and not comfortable at all. The process of creating one is not really precise, it is kinda hit and miss, I was able to make 2 decent ones out of 4 in the box - but even the best one is pretty bad. No returns for this item, so just keep that in mind. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ELVEEZ

customer_reviews.title: These mouth cards have made my job feel much better as I always have a habit of clenching my jaw specially when I slept.  These are very good mouthguard at a very good price
customer_reviews.text: The first set I screwed up by leaving them in the water too long dental duty was nice enough to send me a replacement and they are been working perfectly ever Since. My only suggestion if you buy these is to be very careful read the instructions 3 to 4 times and even watch the YouTube video a few times that will you be very familiar with how to set them up and get them to fit you properly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I have used the DenTek Professional-Fit Maximum Protection Dental Guard for years and never had a problem getting a tight, comfortable fit. I thought I'd try to save some money with these but it was a disaster. I just could not get a good seal and there was way too much plastic covering my gums. I tried to fit the bottom teeth and I thought this thing would slice off my tongue at the base. I went through 2 of them then gave up. These go back and I just ordered a new Dentek.
customer_reviews.author: Sharis

customer_reviews.title: I'll only buy THIS one
customer_reviews.text: I went WEEKS looking for a good bite gaurd at night as I suffer from bruxism and newest diagnosis of TMJ.. I tried every brand and this is the only one that STAYS IN ALL. NIGHT LONG!!! So easy to mold and soooo much more comfortable than other brands!! I'd give this 10 stars IF I COULD!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Ross

customer_reviews.title: Changed My Life!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from TMJ and swollen jaws from grinding my teeth for years. My dentist said I needed a $300.00 mouth guard. I bought this instead, trimmed it to fit my mouth, and all of my pain has been relieved within two weeks! I hope it continues to work because it’s like a miracle for me. I will purchase again. And customer service was superior for me, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Jacpbs

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as expect
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 guards to get this molding right, I thought this would be as easy as it advertise but It was not. This molding needs to be real soft and very hot to put it on the teeth. I wasted 3 of them because it wasn't a perfect formation and I kept repeating the steps and it got ripped. I was hoping this dental guard will help with my grinding unfortunately, after a night of use my jaw were very sore. I'm not sure if my molding was not fit but I have followed the youtube instruction steps carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Standford

customer_reviews.title: Over Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing and have been waiting for it to arrive. I have never had one before, so imagine my shock at a three page instruction pamphlet and then a DVD fell out next. It sounds like a science project to make it fit, don't boil too long. Good grief why doesn't the seller tell you that you must go though all of this to use the product before you order it? I should have just gone to the freaking dentist!
customer_reviews.author: Quinsta

customer_reviews.title: so the price is really great too!
customer_reviews.text: Finally after buy several other types, and throwing them out - this works! Fits well, and you can also cut the extra ones to size, so the price is really great too!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy to mold just right. It fits ok, but I will try the second one to see if i can get a thinner fir. The first one will work, but feels a little bit thick. The seller contacted me by email amd asked how I was doing with the product. when I told them I was having problems with molding the guard, they gave me some tips on changes to make and sent me a new set of guards. Following their tips I was able mold the new guard so that I have a good fit and it is a lot thinner that the first time. Excellent customer service and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Suebee

customer_reviews.title: Just a little too thick, trouble sleeping with it
customer_reviews.text: Personally I have not been able to fall asleep once while having this mouth guard in and i’ve tried for 2 weeks now. It’s just a little too thick and covers your entire upper and/or bottom teeth. Because of this it causes me to constantly remove the mouthpiece for comfort or to breathe better. Nothing wrong with the product itself, it was incredibly easy to mold, just a little thick for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Got no use out of it
customer_reviews.text: I got TMJ from stress-grinding during finals last year. I was recommended to get some kind of guard from amazon before looking into something more professional. I followed the instructions, but it was so thin between my teeth that it didn’t help the grinding. Also fairly uncomfortable, but I imagine most mouth guards are.
customer_reviews.author: Maryn

customer_reviews.title: Shrink
customer_reviews.text: I have had similar mouth guards before. This one is softer plastic. I have a relatively small mouth. Started trying the smaller ones. Shrunk to be too small for my mouth. Larger ones were barely large enough. Hard to fit. Warps as it heats. Got one to fit well. Second one hard to fit. Warped so it wouldn’t fit straight. Thicker edges caused change in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ruralcindy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cast, works great
customer_reviews.text: My dentist told me to find a mouth guard due to my tendency to clench my teeth and I was starting to get to the point I would wake up with a sore jaw from doing it while I was sleeping so I decided to give this brand a go and it has worked great. Took a few nights to get used to but it was easy to cast (I just used some hot water in a coffee cup from my kuerig) and the case they give you is nice to keep it clean and away from all the dog fur around my house. Overall, would definitely recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Imorii

customer_reviews.title: Good job, on a good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been having eggs in my jars because I was clenching my teeth in my sleep, this product relieved me of that pain. It was easy to work with and the instructions were clear and it did exactly what the instructions said a word at each step. At first I was hesitant but then I saw how the instructions were true to their detail and that made all the difference. Good job, on a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ross

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase - does NOT MOLD, it shrinks dramatically
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps there are just some faulty batches because some reviewers apparently go it to work, but it is non-returnable and you will probably get a bad one. I tried doing the first one shortly after a low boil and it whithered into a tiny chunk of sticky plastic. I tried again at a lower temperature, same thing. Tried even lower temperature and it did nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was wary about doing this on my own but after our dentist informed us it would cost 30x more for a custom guard I figured I had nothing to lose. Despite there being quite a few steps (would recommend reading instructions a couple of times and getting everything that is needed ready before starting) the directions were clear and the result was great! Product contains 4 molds (two molds, two sizes -- only complaint is that you really can't tell which size will fit your mouth when it comes out of the box) so there is another for future use. Would definitely purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: iamdidi

customer_reviews.title: Overall, happy for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to form and easy to use. They’re cheap, of course, so they won’t last for years and years, but at the price it’s no big deal to replace them later. I purchased them to help with occasional grinding at night and have found them to be helpful for that purpose. My husband used one for teeth whitening and it doesn’t work as well for that- it’s sufficient, but barely. It doesn’t fit as tightly as the dentist made tray, so there’s less solution absorbed and thus it’s less effective.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the we for use as night guard. I used the large guards and the fit is good..could be just a little longer to reach the back molars. Good instructions for fitting to your teeth. I would like to see a box of just large guards as you have with the small ones. Very good price!! The dentist was charging $436.00 for a month guard, might last longer but had to go back for a minimum of two fittings and my dentist is a 2 hr. round trip. This is so convenient to do this at home.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Works to keep me from grinding my teeth
customer_reviews.text: This night guard works good but it did take me 2 times to get it to fit my mouth just right. The directions help so follow them exactly and is the fit is not right then follow the directions to re-heat and re-form to teeth. I wear them every night. The dentist wanted to charge me almost $400 for custom fit by mold mouth guard so this saved me major bucks,
customer_reviews.author: FOS123

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to like this dental guard because I have been clenching my teeth lately. Though it was somewhat easy to mold, the material for this night guard is rather thick, so it made my lip protrude. I found this uncomfortable and had difficulty keeping it in my mouth for the whole night. I'm disappointed that I can't use this regularly. On the plus side, if the thickness doesn't bother you, this also means that it's more durable than a thin dental guard and will probably last a while.
customer_reviews.author: ShareTheLove

customer_reviews.title: Might be a great product but more info needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for night time teeth grinding. It arrived in a timely fashion. I read the instructions and viewed the recommended video. I then had a question about trimming the guard and submitted it to their website (which stated they usually would answer in a few minutes). Well, it’s been about 9 hours and haven’t heard a thing. Therefore the stars given are low because I cannot review the product because I can’t go forward in the fitting process.
customer_reviews.author: CT Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to mold
customer_reviews.text: This was not my first time molding a dental guard so I wasn't expecting any trouble with it. Unfortunately all my attempts and re-reading of the directions yielded a very loose fitting guard that made me nervous it would easily come loose and fall to the back of my mouth while asleep. I contacted customer support and while they were slow to reply to emails, they did eventually provide a refund. If you prefer very loose fitting mouth guards this might be okay for you, but if you like them tight, I would steer clear of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Domeny

customer_reviews.title: Your teeth will thank you
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I grind my teeth pretty badly at night. I actually chipped my teeth a couple of times. I knew I had to do something. My first choice was terrible, ill fitting and not secure. After reading all the reviews for Dental Guard, I decided to try them and I am happy I did. I really like this product and recommend it. They fit well in your mouth and feel secure. It is a little tricky to mold it, but it does work and they have good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: D-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Guideline Video
customer_reviews.text: I followed the guideline video to make the night guard fit my teeth. However, when I picked it up from the hot water and put it on paper towel to cool it, the melted guards stuck to the paper towel and I could not take them off (I timed myself precisely)! So I wasted one set just because I followed the video. I think it is much better to hold the guards with tongs or something than to put it on a surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kairos C.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to fit. Shrinks when boiled.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tried tag-teaming these and messed up both pairs even when following directions. When it got boiled, it got really wide and the ends shrunk shorter. They float, so the walls don't really start to curve unless you gently Pat it down into the water. Without biting down, this guard would not stay in place well enough for my husband to get anywhere near a decent fit before it cooled. I'm not super happy, to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Whitespeare

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been having problems with tinnitus. My ENT thinks it is due to TMJ issues and recommended I get a mouth brace to prevent jaw clenching/grinding. I ordered the Dental Duty mouth guard. It was delivered promptly. It was easy to shape to fit my mouth, but I messed up one of the guards. The product comes with a replacement guarantee. I contacted the company and was promptly issued an entire new kit. Great customer service!! The guard is helping with my TMJ issues and aiding in getting a better night’s sleep as well!!
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for teeth grinding problems
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased this item twice and will continue to go back for more as I need them. I use the guards to protect my teeth from grinding at night. The mouth guard is very comfortable and has truly helped eliminate my symptoms of teeth grinding. I was getting terrible jaw pain and headaches and they went away in the first two days of using this product. I highly recommend the product! Customer service is also great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for People who Grind Teeth
customer_reviews.text: Save your money at the dentist and get these instead. I was provided a mouth guard by my dentist to prevent teeth grinding in my sleep. It cost me $400 and I had to replace it after two years due to discomfort and they just get nasty after a while. I found these instead and they are so much better than my dentist's mouthguard. Very comfortable and they work perfectly. 4 in a box so I usually change to a new one every 6 months. Easy to mould especially after doing it once. My teeth feel much better in the morning when I wear this at night.
customer_reviews.author: vinniemasch

customer_reviews.title: Protect your grill!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my life. I am a grinder when I sleep. So much that my dentist told me if I don’t use one, I will eventually grind away all that’s important (with regard to my teeth). I purchased one from the dentist and it was $$$ as well as uncomfortable. This one came via prime delivery to my doorstep, and in a matter of minutes I had it setup. Fits wonderfully and is comfortable. I’m not grinding, I’m sleeping all through the night, I highly recommend. And it comes with a set of two! One large and one small.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A Great try !
customer_reviews.text: If you are interested in a nighttime mouth guard and don't want to pay several hundred dollars at your dentist, this is worth a try. I clench my teeth at night and this has helped. I use it every now and then and it works great. It helps you decide if you need to order something more or not and not waste a lot of money. . .
customer_reviews.author: Susan T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase. Had to use this in an emergency when my furry baby chomped away my mouth guard that was left on the dresser. After putting it in hot water, I was able to mould it to fit my mouth. I found it really comfortable and sturdy. Mind you, I have worn dentist made mouth guards all my life. I am blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mouthguards. I can't fit both the bottom and top guards in comfortably, so I just use the top one, but its wonderful nonetheless. I bought these because my jaw was hurting, so I assumed it was because I clench my teeth at night, and these prevent that so well and my jaw pain is gone. They're really comfortable and stay in my mouth all night too.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, but Be Careful Molding!
customer_reviews.text: First set up didn't go well, but the second was ok. You have to be EXTREMELY careful molding these as things can go south very easily. Feels ok now but I feel like I clench more because of the pliability, but at least my teeth no longer hurt. I use the top one with a custom hard plastic bottom night guard from dentist and they work perfectly together. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Redd E.

customer_reviews.title: causes severe gagging
customer_reviews.text: I have used other smaller dental guard in the past. I bought it because of good reviews and seller urged me to buy it. However even after doing everything right, it causes me lot of gagging and I cannot sleep with it. $20 wasted. Go for a smaller guard instead.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Came opened and is a waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the package arrived with the box open and the size small packing open. It was like somebody had already used it! I decided to try the large ones, since it wasn’t open. I couldn’t get the thing to form properly no matter what I did. The think will choke me during the night! I can’t use this thing! It says that the company offers a refund with no questions asked, so I guess I will be emailing them! I bet they never even reply to my email. We will see. I do not recommend this item! I will never buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Enshanted

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my gums
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video and was sure to do exactly as instructed. I did the process twice of molding the piece. The pieces are too thick and my gums were sore every morning from the piece rubbing, so I had to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Rome

customer_reviews.title: NOT for TMJ
customer_reviews.text: False advertising when it comes to TMJ. I purchased this specifically because the ad said can be used with TMJ. But the pamphlet inside warns against use with TMJ. I'm sure it works for whitening or grinding. I haven't even opened the trays, so I can't comment on how easy they are to mould. Just want y'all to know, don't buy if you need something for TMJ.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nice company but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, you get four pieces (2 small, 2 large) any of which can be used for upper or lower. I got them because I started grinding my teeth at night. They mold the same way sports mouthguards do, with hot water. I didn't find them to be much thinner than the sports guards I've used. I actually prefer using the Sisu brand mouthguard because it is much thinner, although it is more rigid.
customer_reviews.author: DeeGee

customer_reviews.title: very very good product - I've tried many. I am a bad grinder
customer_reviews.text: Severe grinder. These boil guards never work for me. I always buy from dentist for the fitted hard ones. I cracked them quickly. She charges $500 buck. Total rip off. So usually I buy the ones one here that you take an impression and mail it in. Those are also good. But I tried this brand and it is VERY good. Just be careful not to let the side curl in when boiling. Follow instructions carefully and you will be fine. Do not boil even a few seconds longer that instructed. Stays in all night.
customer_reviews.author: David.

customer_reviews.title: Save Hundreds
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised & saved me, at least, a couple hundred dollars since my dental plan only covers 50%. The instructions are easy, simple & if followed, render the You Tube & company website videos unnecessary. Once set-up is complete this guard is comfortable & after a couple of nights getting use to wearing it, you don't even realize you're sleeping w/ a device in your mouth. For around $17 & free shipping on Prime, it is worth considering for those in need of a guard.
customer_reviews.author: watchdawg1

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Fits Very Well
customer_reviews.text: This a good product that you could use for sleeping or sports. It's easy to fit. The mouthpiece stays in place all night and is comfortable. It comes with four mouthpieces, so I experimented with an upper and lower fit. I like it better on the upper teeth, but it was good to give it a try on the lower. The guard fits nice and tight; I have to pull to get it out in the morning. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Headache free!
customer_reviews.text: I had gone to the dentist and was quoted around $500 for a mouth guard to help with my headaches. I decided to purchase this to try out before I paid that kind of money to see if my headaches stopped. I am SO glad I stuck with these. I have only used the mouth guard a few days and not a single headache!!! I am so thrilled! It is easy to mold the guard and you can remold it if you mess up. I pulled mine directly out of the water and was able to mold it without burning my mouth at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very prone to “user error”
customer_reviews.text: This may be a good product. But it is very prone to “user error” to mold it to your teeth. It comes with a video and lots of instructions. It also does a good job of telling you if there are certain things you don’t like about it’s form how it’s because you did some part wrong. I would definitely not buy again and would tell others not to.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: They feel like a soccer mouth guard
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and hard to sleep with them in. They feel like a soccer mouth guard.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other mouthguard from CVS and Walgreens. Each one I purchased was overpriced and so bulky I couldn’t sleep comfortably with it in my mouth. I decided to try this product after reading the reviews and doing some research. I was pleasantly surprised with the fit and comfort of it. It did take me two attempts to get a good fit so I was happy the package came with 2 nightguards for both the small and large size. The quality and price point far surpass any other nightguard I have purchased. Happy I tried this product before purchasing a custom nughtguard through my dentist for $400.
customer_reviews.author: LJK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mold and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product over a year ago and waited to review it. I normally wear out a dental guard after a few months of use. I molded this product and have been using the same one for over 1 year and it is still in good shape. It does show wear but has lasted longer than any of these I have used before. I also like that it is pliable so there is some give to it.
customer_reviews.author: JD13

customer_reviews.title: Difficult
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of mouth guards for grinding. This one came up way to high on my gums and even the small size was too big for my mouth. I had to get scissors and cut it down. Then I put it in the boiling water to shape it to my mouth. It just doesn't really hold its shape long. I have to keep reheating it and refitting it.
customer_reviews.author: Arora/k

customer_reviews.title: For teeth grinding
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to do! I thought it would be more complicated. My first attempt was not pretty, but it still fits pretty snugly in my mouth. I had to really contort my face to get it to pop out without using my hands. I'm going to test drive it, tonight. I've recently started grinding my teeth due to stress, and I'm hoping this helps alleviate the sore jaws and teeth in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Greta Maclean

customer_reviews.title: Not for children
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my 8 year old who is a terrible nighttime teeth grinder. We couldn’t get the mold to work for his mother after numerous tries. I took the adult one and made a mold of my teeth and it worked fine. We took the second youth one and tried it again with no luck. While these worked fine on my teeth, I only gave it a 3 star review because I bought it specifically for my son since it said 10 and under on the small size. These will be just fine for an adult but I do not recommend for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product with nice price
customer_reviews.text: This comes with 4 different mouth guards, instructions are easy to follow. My dentist recommended I get a night guard from their office and quoted me over $400. I purchased these instead and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Thick, difficult to mold, and shrinks considerably on one side
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to mold and very thick. I tried the first two small ones on my upper teeth-both did not mold well onto my teeth, and had considerable shrinking on one side which was baffling. So I next tried one of the larger ones, and that one also shrunk considerably on one side. Very disappointed-should be refundable.
customer_reviews.author: NYorker

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Watched the video on youtube, took me 3 minutes to heat, mold and boom Im sleeping good, no teeth, jaws, head pains upon wakening. Imazing $15 fix, my kids went to Dentist spent weeks of time, numerous appointments, co-pay, deductible, ton of money and same results. Remember SOB promised us good insurance and cheap too? F.... liar!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Preparing the proper fit
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It definitely served my purpose regarding grinding teeth at night. When determining your personal fit, be very careful NOT to leave the appliance in the boiling water too long. I would recommend no longer than 4-5 seconds (timed). If that's not enough time, you can always reinsert into the boiling water for a few more seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Tuckman

customer_reviews.title: Money not well spent
customer_reviews.text: I placed the piece in boiling calm water and it folded up and stuck to itself. I even shut the stove off and let the water stop boiling. The plastic is so sticky you cannot unpeel it from itself.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reynolds

product_meta.title: Professional Mouth Guard for Grinding Teeth, 2 Sizes, 4 Pieces Mouthguard, Moldable Night Guards for Teeth Grinding, Night Guard Eliminates Bruxism & Teeth Clenching, Antibacterial Dental Guard Case
feature_bullets: MULTI-USE MOUTH GUARDS: Our mouth guard can be used in many situations, such as protection against nighttime teeth grinding and clenching or sports; you can even use them as teeth trays for whitening - any whitening gel stays in place so you get a great whitening experience

2 SIZES TO FIT YOUR NEEDS: Our teeth grinding guard comes in 2 different sizes, which can be trimmed to fit any mouth - regular and small - both pleasantly fit in your mouth, eliminating the feeling of overwhelming bulkiness and irritation on sensitive gums

COMFORTABLE FIT FOR ANY MOUTH: Easily mold our teeth grinding mouth guard for sleep to your unique mouth so you have the most comfortable fit; our bite guard comes with easy to follow instructions on how to mold them - all you need is water

NO MORE EXPENSIVE NIGHT GUARD: You don’t need to spend hundreds of dollars at the dentist for a high quality bite guard for teeth grinding; our BPA free dental night guard gives you the same professional quality at a great price; and it comes with an antibacterial case

PERFECT FIT GUARANTEE: If you are unhappy with your dental guard for teeth grinding or have trouble moulding them, please contact us directly and we will offer you a refund or a replacement even after 30 days of purchase

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
